main.name: Le Tan Luc
main.description: I am an enthusiastic, self-motivated, reliable, responsible and hardworking person. I am a mature team worker and adaptable to all challenging situations. I am able to work well both in a team environment as well as using own initiative. I am able to work well under pressure and adhere to strict deadlines
main.bio: I do the work I do because I love it. Keep simple, everything possible. I like the industry. I like the people I meet. I like to make the web a better place. Hopefully we cross paths in the real world someday and we can make it a better place together.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

address.street: 184/25 Bui Van Ngu, Hiep Thanh Ward, District 12

resume.skillmessage: Over 5 years of experiences in software engineering. 3 years+ of experience .Net developer, experiences on working with ASP.NET - applications from small to big scale with full understanding of most of the software development process models: waterfall, SRUM.
resume.techmessage: I'm a Luc Le and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over.

education.description: I was teached about technical with programming language such as: Java, C#, ASP.NET. About web applition is: HTML, JS, Javascript, CSSS. And tool: MSSQL, Netbean, Visual Studio, Notepad++, SVN.

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.description: Responsibilities: Developing new features for the production of a web application, Handling bugs raised by customers/QA, Support team member to solve problems while working, Contribute ideas or solutions to team. Technologies: C#, ASP.NET, VB.NET, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, CoffeeScript, Javascript, JQuery, Ajax, MS SQL, PostgreSQL, Sidekiq

work.title: Senior Engineer
work.description: Responsibilities: Developing new features for the production of a web application, Handling bugs raised by customers/QA, Support team member to solve problems while working, Contribute ideas or solutions to team. Technologies: C#, ASP.NET, Winform, Android, CakePHP, Javascript, JQuery, Ajax, MS SQL

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Responsibilities: Developing new features for the production of a web application, Handling bugs raised by customers/QA. Technologies: C#, ASP.NET, Javascript, JQuery, Ajax, MS SQL

techs.name: Git
techs.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control.

techs.name: .NET
techs.description: I have worked with many programming languages and frameworks. However, I enjoy .NET because it is free and open-source, can run in cross platforms like: Linux, Mac, Windows, and it has a huge community.

techs.name: Ruby On Rails
techs.description: I enjoy Ruby on Rails for it's ease of configuration and its ability to get a full stack prototype up and running quickly. I am using Ruby on Rails in a team for Akouba (below in portfolio)

techs.name: React Js
techs.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

techs.name: Bootstrap 4
techs.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

techs.name: PostgreSQL
techs.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of PostgreSQL better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

techs.name: Heroku
techs.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

testimonials.text: He will be a good developer. It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
